summary: This is a sealed court order from the Southern District of New York, dated April 1, 2019, granting the U.S. Attorney's Office permission to compel the law firm Boies Schiller & Flexner LLP to provide confidential materials from the civil case 'Giuffre v. Maxwell' to a federal grand jury investigating Ghislaine Maxwell, overriding a previous protective order.

persons.name: Colleen McMahon
persons.context: Issued the sealed court order permitting Boies Schiller & Flexner LLP to provide confidential materials from a civil case to a federal grand jury investigation.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as a defendant in the civil case (15 Civ. 7433) from which confidential materials are being subpoenaed for a federal grand jury investigation.

connections.description: The law firm possessed materials from the civil case 'Giuffre v. Maxwell' and was ordered to provide them to the government, indicating they were involved in the legal proceedings concerning Maxwell.

events.title: Protective Order Issued
events.description: A protective order was issued in the civil case 'Giuffre v. Maxwell, et al.,' (15 Civ. 7433) to keep certain materials confidential.

events.title: Court Order to Provide Grand Jury Materials
events.description: Judge Colleen McMahon issued a sealed order permitting Boies Schiller & Flexner LLP to provide confidential materials from the 'Giuffre v. Maxwell' civil case to the government for a federal grand jury investigation.

keyFacts: A federal grand jury investigation into Ghislaine Maxwell was active as of April 2019, leading to the subpoena of materials from a related civil case.
The court overrode a 2016 protective order from the civil case 'Giuffre v. Maxwell' to allow confidential discovery materials to be provided to criminal investigators.
The law firm Boies Schiller & Flexner LLP was compelled to comply with the grand jury subpoena, indicating it held relevant evidence.
The order was sealed, highlighting the sensitive and ongoing nature of the criminal investigation at the time.
